ygData.subject: Re: bandages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Which means you should, once you get your first point in specialisation, practice the skill you want to specialise in. Then, once it has crossed the
ygData.messageBody:
According to Sergey Bukhman:
> You can't. Your specialization rises automatically in every skill, just
> like your regular skill, but only one of them can go over 50. The first
> one to cross 50 is the one you concentrate on. So pay attention and
> don't let any other skill do it by accident.

Which means you should, once you get your first point in specialisation,
practice the skill you want to specialise in. Then, once it has crossed
the threshold, invest in the other specialise.

--
